channel.title: MybbHosting - Ad-free
channel.description:
Hey, Can you rate what you think of my MybbHosting site please?
http://mybbhosting.info - Rate out of 10 thanks!

item.title: MybbHosting - Ad-free
item.dc:creator: @kingduffy_1 kingduffy 1
item.description:
@kingduffy_1 wrote:

Idk, it seems ripped off cuz I saw that � thing at the bottom where footer is, and dats usually when u paste stuff cuz i done it before. On your TOS page you have I), II), and III) when you could just use css to make it better. Your create forum page is corny too >.<, you should make ur own design. I am kind of suspicious of the coding too cuz you got like everything running except image hosting and all that done. Kind of weird to get a site rated that is unfinished, no offense.

But yeah, I rate the site 6/10 cuz of the skin. Looks like you tried to copy off of http://www.rscheata.net/ a bit. But I know you didnt cuz someone else did the skin for your forum and stuff, so. Idk really. Hard to actually r8 u, soz.

Like stated in the copyright:
Skin is based off of MybbStudios BluWeb theme for Mybb forums.

Read full topic

item.title: MybbHosting - Ad-free
item.dc:creator: @ThAt0n36Uy Elijah
item.description:
@ThAt0n36Uy wrote:

For one thing the registration process if fucked up.

Access Name: spam Email Address: spam@spam.com Username: spam Password: spamspam Pass Confirm: spamspam Forum Name: spamspam ERROR: Your forum name is not the right length. It must be between 6 and 20 characters long. Please hit your browser back button and try again.

Second you’re fucking retarded for making a cheap ass hosting service, and using a crappy bb for it.

-2/10

Read full topic
